location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on paper.Dimensions: 1350 x 780mm, on sheet 1410 x 830mm.

mods.abstract: Blueprint sketch map dated 21 May 1934, and revised 10 January 1938, produced by the Producing Department of the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO).Shows names of settlements, and location of oil pipelines, water pipelines, telephone lines, gas lines, company roads, 'native' roads, and power lines, indicated in a key in the lower left portion of the map.Also shows BAPCO installations, and locations of wells.Revisions listed, 1936-38.
